concept.shortdesc: This section contains information about the JIRA intregration with IBM Control Desk.

conbody.p: ICD is used to provide users ability to raise tickets for IT services and including the issues on Software.
In-house Software teams, uses the JIRA to manage Issues/Projects. In general Atlassian suite is used for Coding/Collaboration.
Using ICD capability, JIRA is integrated to manage projects and issues.
Once the integration with JIRA is completed, you will able to perform the below actions:

ol.li: Create issues in Jira:Incidents reported by a user on ICD need to be forwarded to JIRA as an issue to be solved by the Software team.
Update in Issue: The status of the issue from JIRA needs to be reflected in the incident ticket. Also, update in description, priority of the issue will be reflected in ICD incident.
Worklog update:Any update in the comment in JIRA defect, will be updated as a worklog in ICD incident.
